metadata.name: Extra Options
metadata.description:
This mod provides a UI for some extra options the game provides in the options.ini file that aren't available in the default options menu.
The API doesn't provide access to everything in the options.ini file. This is just taking advantage of what's available.
Options that can be set: AnnouncerVoiceMode, ConsoleFont, DebugConsoleEnabled, FadedConsoleDisplay, MaxRenderScale, MaxScale, MouseControl, PauseOnFocusLost, RumbleEnabled, SaveCommandHistory, UseBorderlessFullscreen, VSync
Mod Config Menu is required to change settings.
